list_definition.definition: a game played by kicking a large ball; soccer
the ball used in this game.

list_ex_of_english: She also taught children to play football and basketball.
The coach looked at the football players with the fans who were very happy.

The students have to write a program to provide answers to questions like which teams have lost a football match at home?
Some 40% of urban married men and 55% of urban bachelors played sport-usually football.

I think he is a good football player.
A rank ordering is therefore very much at the heart of football assignments - even if it is a one-sided rank ordering.
